name: Ext_R5_Device_gateway
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Device.gateway for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.gateway from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller
element.definition: The linked device acting as a communication controller, data collector, translator, or concentrator for the current device (e.g., mobile phone application that relays a blood pressure device's data).
element.comment: `Device.gateway` has no related element in R4B:Device

element.short: Linked device acting as a communication/data collector, translator or controller
element.definition: The linked device acting as a communication controller, data collector, translator, or concentrator for the current device (e.g., mobile phone application that relays a blood pressure device's data).
